name: The Icebound King
description:
Enter the crypt of the Icebound King, reclaim his treasure trove, and escape.  The "escape" bit might be the tricky part. Crypt diggers beware!

A Norse-themed Crypt intended for “Best Left Buried” by Soul Muppet Publishing, but is readily adaptable to most Fantasy Role Playing Games.   

“The Icebound King” is an independent production by Rat Bastard Press and is not affiliated with Soul Muppet Publishing.
